name: auto-exec
objective: Sound juicer is launched when an audio CD is inserted
description:
In "settings", "details", "removable media", select sound-juicer for cd audio.
Insert an audio CD and check that sound juicer opens, displaying the media content.

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD

author: jb

name: play-music
description: Insert an audio CD and play its content with sound-juicer

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
the music is played

author: jb

name: volume
description: Insert an audio CD and play its content with sound-juicer

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
the music is played
the volume is changed

author: jb

name: play-selected-music
objective: Sound juicer plays selected tracks of an audio CD
description: Insert an audio CD, selected some tracks and play it with sound-juicer

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
only the selected tracks are played

author: jb

name: pause-resume-seek
objective: Sound juicer pauses, resumes and seeks within an audio track
description:
Insert an audio CD and play its content with sound-juicer. 
Play pause and resume within a track.
Within the same track, seek forward and backward.

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
the music is played
the playing of music stops
the playing of music is restarted from where it stopped
the playing of music is updated to the seek position

author: jb

name: navigate-tracks
objective: Sound juicer plays audio CD tracks as wanted
description:
Insert an audio CD and play its content with sound-juicer. 
Navigate from one track to the other forward and backward.

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
the first selected track is played
the next track is played
the previous track is played

author: jb

name: extract-music
description: Insert an audio CD and extract its content with sound-juicer

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
all the tracks are extracted
the files are in the filesystem

author: jb

name: extract-selected-music
objective: Sound juicer extracts selected tracks of an audio CD
description: Insert an audio CD, select some tracks and extract it with sound-juicer

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
only the selected tracks are extracted
the files are in the filesystem

author: jb

name: change-settings
description:
change the settings and check that they are applied
Use the preferences to check that music can be exracted to MP3, Vorbis, FLAC and MP4(AAC) formats

steps.expected: the settings dialog opens

steps.description: change the structure and the output format and then extract an audio CD
steps.expected: changes made are effective

steps.description: iterate the previous step to cover all cases
steps.expected: all cases are ok

author: jb

name: copy-audio-cd
objective: Sound-Juicer cooperate with Brasero to duplicate audio CD
description:
Insert an audio CD and ask to duplicate it in the menu. 
It should launch Brasero.

steps.expected: sound juicer opens and display the content of the audio CD
the brasero dialog is opened

author: jb
